column4: lol, my drive keeps renaming itself. first sdc1, then sda1, then sdb1
ok how do i get the UUID?
ok, so fstab works with uuid?
in fact, it works better with uuid :-)
how can i check my external ip address with a local one?
connect to the router providing the information.
most of them have a web interface which will display the configuration of both interfaces
time for a new isp. there are website that will show you your external facing address. whatismyip.com and the like.
